{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3480550,"name":"","username":"MrEverett","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/ecae2f/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-13T01:42:16.539Z","cooked":"

I have a climber design but in order to stay inside the frame, the foot must be retracted at the start of the match.
It would start in the pictured position and then rotate down over the bumper.

Any ideas on how to actuate this foot outward and lock it in place? I was thinking some sort of ratchet that was just operated by gravity, but that seems janky to me.

Screenshot 2025-01-12 194052757×745 43.8 KB
